PAD_CrucibleFull.synopsis: Player clicks on the crucible after it's filled.

PAD_AdamantineForge.synopsis: Player sees the forge in Grymforge for the first time. They comment appropriately in awe.

PAD_UsedForge.synopsis: Player clicks on forge, and notes that there is a place for a mould to fit. If they have found one of the keys already, they remark that that particular object will fit.
PAD_UsedForge.how_to_trigger: go to -558; -4; 233Click on the mould chamber

PAD_Descent.synopsis: The Adamantine Forge platform moves down after the party activates it. The party reacts.

PAD_SpawnedEnemies.synopsis: The player has activated the forge and a mini-boss emerges from the lava. Most likley a large golem or a fire elemental.

PAD_FilledReceptacle.synopsis: The player just finished either putting Mithral in the forge's crucible or the key in the forge. Line is different depending on what the player has obtained when interacting with the forge.

PAD_ForgingIncomplete.synopsis: Adamantine forge: players have inserted mould into the mould chamber, mithral into the forge, clicked the lever to trigger the hammer and the platform went down. Now they click again on the forge/chamber expecting to get the result. However, they still need to add the lava. This PAD is a hint to the fact that something is still missing (or, after crafting once, that lava needs to be added).
PAD_ForgingIncomplete.how_to_trigger: Go to adamantine forgecreate UNI_LOOT_AdamantineForge_ScimitarMoldcreate UNI_PUZ_MithralOrefill mold chamber and forgeclick lever to trigger hammer strikeclick on the chamber or forge

PAD_AdamantineForge_0.speaker: Player
PAD_AdamantineForge_0.text: Hells. This place is a sight to behold.
PAD_AdamantineForge_0.context: NodeContext: [Astarion - seeing a big, impressive forge for the first time]

PAD_AdamantineForge_1.speaker: Player
PAD_AdamantineForge_1.text: This must be the forge. What a sight to behold.

PAD_UsedForge_0.speaker: Player
PAD_UsedForge_0.text: An opening in the metal. That mould should fit perfectly.

PAD_UsedForge_1.speaker: Player
PAD_UsedForge_1.text: Something's missing. I'll need a mould to get this thing running.

PAD_Descent_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Descent_0.text: That did the trick, all right. And... down it goes.

PAD_SpawnedEnemies_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SpawnedEnemies_0.text: Hells. I think I woke something up.

PAD_FilledReceptacle_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FilledReceptacle_0.text: A perfect fit. I just need the raw materials.

PAD_FilledReceptacle_1.speaker: Player
PAD_FilledReceptacle_1.text: Mithral added. But something is still missing...

PAD_FilledReceptacle_2.speaker: Player
PAD_FilledReceptacle_2.text: That should be everything. Let's see what this thing can do.

PAD_FilledReceptacle_3.speaker: Player
PAD_FilledReceptacle_3.text: Almost there. I just need to insert the mould.

PAD_ForgingIncomplete_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ForgingIncomplete_0.text: Mould and metal... but something's still missing.

PAD_ForgingIncomplete_1.speaker: Player
PAD_ForgingIncomplete_1.text: Ore and mould - but they still need the lava to bind them.
